author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Department of Science and Humanities of AVS Engineering College here organised a Science Project Expo-2016 on the college premises in connection with the National Science Day.

More than 60 projects and science models on the latest achievements of the country in the field of science and technology such as wind energy, solar energy, mobile tracker, rain indictor, magnetic levitated train, electro-magnetic induction were displayed by the first year B.E students.

The expo kindled the thirst of innovation among budding engineers they were highly motivated to showcase their talents. Puzzles and

demonstrations were done in Mathematics and English also. K. Senthil Kumar, Correspondent of AVS Engineering College, inaugurated the programme. S. Ragunathan, Principal of AVSEC, commended the participating students. Prizes were distributed to the best projects at the end.
title: Students showcase their ideas at science expo
